author: Fiona Denton
description:
A cosy fantasy taking place in the world of The Demon Cycle? It feels like it shouldn’t work, but it actually does work really, really well. Peter V. Brett has done the bookish equivalent of sweet and sour chicken with his novella Butter Cookies and Demon Claws. After reading this, I really want other authors […]

The post REVIEW: Butter Cookies and Demon Claws by Peter V. Brett appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Butter Cookies and Demon Claws by Peter V. Brett
